column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered the Los Drowned
column6: and Loco Moco. All the food was unique
column8: and very filling. The portions were
column10: huge. The menu features classic American food with an unexpected twist. However
column12: so I would recommend asking your waiter/waitress for more information. For example
column13: my friend thought she was ordering a burger and it ended up being served without a bun
column14: but she thoroughly enjoyed her meal regardless.
